roleset.name: assess, possibly in search of something specific, resulting in a judgment
roleset.note: EVALUATE-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus, and comparison with 'consider'. Member of VNcls assessment-34.1. (from evaluate.01-v); EVALUATE-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in Medical Q& A corpus. Framed by Anwen. (from evaluate.101-v)
EVALUATION-N NOTES: Based on nouns-00080. Comparison to 'evaluate.01'. VN class assessment-34.1. Updated by Julia (from evaluation.01-n)

roles.note: arg 2 added in keeping with VNcls, expected usage. (from evaluation.01-n)

role.descr: the judgment made as a result of the evaluation (evaluated as, evaluate that_)
thing that Arg1 is evaluated in search of (evaluated for)

example.name: autogen2
example.text: an electronic evaluation of a well

example.name: Both args
example.text: The government's technical and financial evaluation of the Bofors deal

example.name: with arg 2
example.text: I do agree with what Bloom said about Frankenstein in his article, especially in his evaluation that the creature was actually more human than his creator
example.arg: that the creature was actually more human than his creator

example.name: All args
example.text: When-1 can you safely evaluate a young woman with chest pain for coronary artery disease *t*-1?
example.arg: a young woman with chest pain
